divs: Sighting DetailsMy UFO sighting happened while I was driving on Hwy 820 in Fort Worth. (The sky was free of clouds.) I was on my way to Trade School and concentrating on the traffic and listening to the radio. All of a sudden my attention was captured by a bright light in the sky. The light made an abrupt movement and quickly disappeared. I had an immediate process of deduction going through my mind following the sighting. I told myself that it couldn't have been an airplane, helicopter etc...becauce it was so unbelievably fast. And the light was so brilliant and its movement was not like a normal aircraft. I distinctly had a feeling that what ever it was did no really want to be seen. And I did not get to see it very long at all. But I do know that I saw something that to this very day make me wonder deeply about reality. I became alot more passionate about topics involving ancient Egypt, Stonehenge, crop circles, Nazca Lines ... History Channel programs. At the Trade School, while in computer class, I did mention to a classmate what I had witnessed earlier while driving and other classmates heard the conversation and rudely made fun of me for telling about my UFO account. I felt slightly embarrassed but quickly shrugged it off. I couldn't allow any one to shame me into thinking that what I saw was just my imagination. During my sighting I never became afraid only bewildered and mesmerized. In less than 10 years I had a second sighting. This occurrence I was a passenger in my sister's car. She was driving. We were traveling south bound on 360 and just having a normal conversation. At the same time our attention was drawn to a bright light in a clear night sky. The light moved simular to my first sighting and I was once again amazed. I had to calm my sister down. She asked me "Did you see that?" And I replied "Remember I told you I saw a UFO before and you didn't believe me?...Now you got to see what I saw! She told me that she couldn't hardly drive because her leg was shaking so bad and she said it felt like her heart was beating out of her chest! I asked her to calm down because it was gone. She then said "We can't tell any body about this 'cause they'll think that we're crazy. I told her I knew, I had already found that out but that I didn't care what others thought. Anyway, that's what I remember. Thanks for the opportunity to share with others. Sincerely, Salem
